item.title: Moving to GitHub
item.description: I've been threatening to move my lab's website to GitHub. We now have a working site here using Pelican. This should make it easier to maintain and to share updating duties among different team members. I'm also hopeful that it will give some of the students a chance to learn about version control and open science practices. YOLO, or should I say YMMV? In any event, OMG, we're doing it.
item.dc:creator: Rick Gilmore
